greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers n such that 8*R_n - 5 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comment: Also numbers n >= 1 such that (8*10^n-53)/9 is prime.
link: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 88...883.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
program: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..500] | IsPrime((8*10^n-53) div 9)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 01 2014
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Oct 14 2004
